class opp_ini.opp_ini.Application¶

Bases: object

This class represents a generic application It has attributes and methods common to every application It is the base class of other more specific applications

class opp_ini.opp_ini.Topology¶

Bases: object

This class represents a generic topology It has attributes and methods common to every topology It is the base class of other more specific classes Current derived classes that have been implemented:

  • RLFT

  • Torus

    • Torus2D

opp_ini.opp_ini.backup_configuration(simulation)¶

Backups the current omnetpp.ini file in the root of the simulation directory

Parameters:

simulation (-) – the simulation that contains the fields of the configuration file.

opp_ini.opp_ini.check_configuration(simulation) → str¶

It returns the name of the configuration from omnetpp.ini.

Parameters:

simulation (Simulation) – the simulation folder to be checked.

Returns:

the name of the configuration.

Return type:

str

opp_ini.opp_ini.get_configuration(simulation) → str¶

It retrieves the first configuration within the omnetpp.ini file.

Parameters:

simulation (Simulation) – the simulation folder to be checked.

Returns:

The first configuration found in the omnetpp.ini file. Prints “Nothing Found” if no configurations where found

Return type:

str

opp_ini.opp_ini.get_configurations(simulation)¶

It retrieves all the configurations within the omnetpp.ini file

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

A list of the configurations located in the omnetpp.ini file. Prints “Nothing Found” if no configurations where found

opp_ini.opp_ini.get_switch_arbiter(simulation)¶

It retrieves the current switch arbiter in use

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

a string with the current switch arbiter being used

opp_ini.opp_ini.get_switch_architecture(simulation)¶

It retrieves the current switch architecture in use

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

a string with the current switch architecture being used

opp_ini.opp_ini.get_switch_request_processing_time(simulation)¶

It retrieves the current switch request processing time in use

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

a string with the current switch request processing time

opp_ini.opp_ini.get_switch_routing(simulation)¶

It retrieves the current switch routing algorithm in use

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

a string with the current switch routing algorithm being used

the name of the configuration.

  • str

opp_ini.opp_ini.set_default_configuration(simulation, topology)¶

It writes a default omnetpp.ini file

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder where to write the file

opp_ini.opp_ini.set_new_configuration(simulation)¶

It adds a new configuration in the omnetpp.ini file.

Parameters:

simulation (Simulation) – The simulation folder where the omnetpp.ini file is located.
